articles.description: Twisted Steel RC Hobby Shop in Roseburg is closing its doors. The store confirmed it is going out of business, urging customers to use credits and warranties soon. A cash-only blowout sale with up to 50% off starts August 22, 2025. All sales final, no refunds or exchanges.

articles.description: Claire’s in Roseburg, located at 780 NW Garden Valley Boulevard, Suite 100, will close on August 26, 2025. The closure is part of the retailer’s nationwide bankruptcy restructuring. Shoppers can expect liquidation sales until the final day, marking the end of a nostalgic local favorite.
